name: Those Nights at Randy's 5: Radiation Demo
name_original: Those Nights at Randy's 5: Radiation Demo
description: THOSE NIGHTS AT RANDY'S 5: RADIATION OVERVIEW  Full Release 31-10-23  Based sometime in the 1970s, Randal & Friends Diner has offered you a position on the team! But first you must complete a workplace trial to see how you manage during different work scenarios & to test your skills.   However, a dark truth will unfold during your trial & you will need to  discover the real reason for the trial. Your visions may save you from the  worst. Randal holds the truth.  --------------------------------------------------------------------------- GAMEPLAY:   The gameplay in Those Nights at Randy's Radiation uses a mix of free roam movement & sit 'n survive, new mechanics & some recent ones from older  games have been used to create a scary environment. Graphics have been  pushed to their max to make the game & characters feel more realistic.  The design for the characters has taken away from the generic robotic structure & now have been designed to look more costume like instead of  plastic.  NOTE: Those Nights at Randy's Radiation supports Ray Tracing & may impact low end PCs a lot during gameplay.  --------------------------------------------------------------------------- DLC:  Those Nights at Randy's Radiation will feature 2 extra story packs that will separate .exes, both story packs will contain 2 story levels & an extra mode.  Those Nights at Randy's 5 Radiation is a story only game & does not feature any game modes that have appeared in Those Nights at Randy's 4.
